# Design (Work)

> **Note:** This extends the base template from `shared/code/templates/docs/design.md`
> 
> See [shared/code/templates/docs/design.md](../../../../shared/code/templates/docs/design.md) for the full template.

## Work-Specific Requirements

For work projects, design docs must include:
- **Security architecture** - Threat model, data flows, access controls
- **Data classification** - What data is processed and its sensitivity
- **Compliance requirements** - Regulatory obligations (SOX, PCI, etc.)
- **Approved technologies** - Only use pre-approved tools and frameworks
- **Audit logging** - What events must be logged for compliance
- **Change management** - Links to change tickets and approvals

## Required Additional Sections

### Security Architecture
- Authentication and authorization model
- Data encryption (at rest and in transit)
- Secrets management approach
- Network security considerations

### Compliance
- [ ] Data classification documented
- [ ] Privacy requirements addressed
- [ ] Audit logging specified
- [ ] Change ticket created and approved

### Approvals
| Role | Name | Date | Ticket |
|------|------|------|--------|
| Architecture | | | |
| Security | | | |
| Compliance | | | |
